survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer attitudes and behaviors toward smart home technology adoption, including perceived benefits, barriers, and usage patterns.

questions.question_text: Which of the following smart home devices do you currently own or use?
answer_options: Smart speakers (e.g., Amazon Echo, Google Home)
questions.client_notes: This question helps gauge current adoption levels. Consider randomizing the order of options to reduce bias.
